# qpdfでPDF操作 {#qpdf}


# 関数一覧

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(qpdf)

  # PDFのページ数取得，show the number of pages in a pdf
pdf_length(input, password = "")

  # PDFを1ページずつ別ファイルに分割，split a single pdf into separate files, one for each page
pdf_split(input, output = NULL, password = "")

  # PDFから指定ページを抽出，create a new pdf with a subset of the input pages
pdf_subset(input, pages = 1, output = NULL, password = "")

  # 複数のPDFを1つに結合，join several pdf files into one
pdf_combine(input, output = NULL, password = "")

  # PDFの圧縮，compress or linearize a pdf file
pdf_compress(input, output = NULL, linearize = FALSE, password = "")

  # 指定ページを回転，rotate selected pages
pdf_rotate_pages(input, pages, angle = 90, relative = FALSE, output = NULL, password = "")

  # PDFを重ね合わせ
pdf_overlay_stamp(input, stamp, output = NULL, password = "")
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
input <- ""

#' 
add_each_stamps <- function(input, stamp){
setwd("D:/matu/work/tmp")
input <- "input.pdf"
stamp <- "stamp.pdf"
  if(qpdf::pdf_length(input) > qpdf::pdf_length(stamp)){
    error("Total page number of stamp must be equal or bigger than input!")
  }
  pages <- qpdf::pdf_split(input)
  stamps <- qpdf::pdf_split(stamp)
  out <- list()
  for(i in seq_along(pages)){
    out[[i]] <- qpdf::pdf_overlay_stamp(pages[i], stamps[i])
  }
  pdf_combine(unlist(out))
  file.remove(pages)
  file.remove(stamps)
  file.remove(unlist(out))
}
```
